taxonomy.title: Material
taxonomy.description: This facet describes the materials that make up an object (another aspect of what it is). The organization loosely follows the popular animal/vegetable/mineral pattern.
taxonomy.notes:
This facet particularly reflects the non-specialist audience, and follows a folk organization. The topics are mostly the same as would be present for a specialist in anthropology, but the organization and chosen labels are different.
Terms to add: Crystal Lead/leaded Crystal Foil - where would I file this?
